name: Curse of Korthos
description:
Bring Color back into this strange world and stop the Curse of Khorsus.

You have to play with sound on, it is an important part of the game.

The game was made in Unity, Ive used some free  lowpoly models and  soundpacks from the asset store.

I would be very happy if you write what you think about the game in the comments. Also I recommend downloading the game for optimal experience without lags.

Have Fun Playing!
